instructions: AkashD September 3, 2011 at 8:29 pm You can easily connect to the internet via your Samsung T401G. 1) Download & install 'Samsung New PC Studio' from Samsung's website. 2) Connect your phone via Bluetooth or USB to the New PC Studio.. once it has paired.. you can connect to the internet by clicking 'Internet Connector' icon in the toolbox or in the Communicator menu. (Configure appropriate settings in Internet Connector and activate relevant settings in your mobile in both cases) Secondly, If you don't wish to use PC Studio, pair you phone directly from your Laptop via Bluetooth, Once it has done, Goto >> Control Panel >> Network Connections. There, you will see a network connection most probably on your Device name with a property 'Bluetooth / DUN Connection'. Click Connect, enter your Dial up number.. and you'll be connected to the internet.. :)
